title: The presidential appointee's handbook
subjects: Cabinet officers -- Selection and appointment -- United States
Government executives -- Selection and appointment -- United States
Judges -- Selection and appointment -- United States
United States -- Officials and employees -- Selection and appointment

description.value: "Explains the core competencies that distinguish successful presidential appointees. Draws on ideas developed by scholars of public and business management, as well as years of government service. Presents a guide to the key terms, laws, and regulations that new appointees will have to deal with once in office"--Provided by publisher.
